reviews.review_msg: AVOID. her teaching is awful with bad feedbacks and grading is just based on how she likes you or not. essays are with repetitive topics and really LAME. she also makes you to buy a 70 dollar ebook or your participation grade is gonna be a sh*t show. when i took it her lecture was online so idk how things have changed but i would not take her again

She is a nice person, BUT she gives horrible feedback in general. Whenever you need something explained, she does not know how to approach your question. She responds to emails relatively fast yet she fails to answer the questions in them. During lectures, she will get lost in the reading and circle around the point instead of making it directly.
Literally the best professor at sfu, always available to meet for feedback, never says no if you reach out, I would love to take another class with him, he always went above and beyond for us.
He gives clear information on what he's looking for. Ask him all the questions you have and he will help you out so much.

I am in my first year of university and Joel's class was  a perfect class to take. He is caring and engages well with the students. You can tell he's really passionate about what he does. He is really funny and he gives great feedback. LOVE THIS GUY BEST PROF AT SFU FOR SURE. Take his class. He is so full of energy and super nice
Super helpful prof and even helps you with papers outside of FAL. Doesn't assign a lot of homework

I love this professor, who is arguably the BEST professor at SFU. I love attending his class. He engages with everyone and gives you great feedback! He's very personable and has a great sense of humour. He will meet with you to review papers and he gives great feedback. Overall 10/10 prof

This is a rating for EDUC 388

No words needed, simply the BEST PROF EVER! He is the most hilarious prof I ever had. It is the only lecture that I actually look forward too and makes his lectures engaging. The material in class was super easy with 3 major papers and 2 online assessments made for completion. He is very good at giving feedback and takes good care for his students.
He is one of the best professors I've ever had. He is passionate about teaching and gives good feedback on assignments. Recommend 100% to those who need to take FALX99!!

Prof HH was amazing to have during the peak of the pandemic last year. He made the class super easy and always gave us good feedback on an individual zoom call. There were some pretty short weekly assignments and lecture material, but they all turned out to be incredibly useful. Would definitely take a class with him again.

He provides great grading criteria and doesn't mark too heavily. He is very approachable and he cares about his students and is very passionate about what he is teaching. He's a funny guy too! I'd take his class if he taught a different class.

Joel is my favourite professor. Lectures are interesting and easy to follow. He's super chill and cares about his students. Pro-tip: If you like the Yankees, maybe don't? Or, if you must and you're in Joel's class, be prepared to debate.
He is the most caring professor that Ive ever met. Hes friendly and gives good feedback on every writing assignments. Grades are based on in class writing and one other research paper mostly.
Hes funny and nice, but he cancels classes just one hour before the time..., come on who does it were stuck on the mountain already
